title: Subpart 56-8 - Phase Ii B Asbestos Abatement
content:
Subpart 56-8 - Phase Ii B Asbestos Abatement

State Regulations
§ 56-8.1 - Air sampling requirements
§ 56-8.2 - Access to and maintenance of decontamination systems and regulated abatement work area enclosures
§ 56-8.3 - Regulated abatement work area entry and exit procedures
§ 56-8.4 - Handling and removal procedures
§ 56-8.5 - Waste clean-up procedures
§ 56-8.6 - Multiple abatement within a single regulated abatement work area
§ 56-8.7 - Encapsulation procedures
§ 56-8.8 - Asbestos material encasement/enclosure procedures
§ 56-8.9 - Equipment and waste container decontamination and removal procedures

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
